title: Memphis: Identity Workhorse?
content:
Hello.

I'm working on an identity project and am considering using Memphis as the main workhorse for bulk text, correspondence, etc. I don't own it and haven't really used it before, at least not in this context.

Can anyone comment on how well the OpenType version performs in day-to-day layperson use? I mean, how is the default character spacing, general flow of the text, etc. Does it generally need a lot of tweaking or can I just let it go and get good results?

Thanks,  
ThreeDot
author: Threedot
